血压波动可能是老年人患痴呆症风险的罪魁祸首澳大利亚研究人员发现，血压波动（而不仅仅是高水平）与老年人患痴呆症和血管问题的风险增加有关。该研究表明，血压变异性可能是认知障碍的早期标志，为治疗开辟了新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Fluctuating-blood-Pressure-may-be-a-hidden-culprit-in-dementia-risk-for-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Fluctuating-blood-Pressure-may-be-a-hidden-culprit-in-dementia-risk-for-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dcc8f04-2fe8-4bd3-af56-be0b320ddfc2 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 01:18:00 -0400 Fluctuating blood pressure may be a hidden culprit in dementia risk for seniors
